unnormalised: Please provide your KYC details including your PAN no., Aadhaar no., and bank account IFSC code to process the loan application. Also, mention your GSTIN if applicable.
normalised: Please provide your K-Y-C details including your P-A-N number, Aadhaar number, and bank account I-F-S-C code to process the loan application. Also, mention your G-S-T-I-N if applicable.
